CodeBlockMethod.Name: SpawnTop_L
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(mon_lv == 0)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_0_L,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(-42.464,12.2,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 elseif(mon_lv == 1)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_1_L,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(-42.464,12.2,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 elseif(mon_lv == 2)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_2_L,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(-42.464,12.2,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 elseif(mon_lv == 3)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_3_L,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(-42.464,12.2,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 end self:chat_change(self.zig,"상단으로 진격!","돌격 앞으로!!!")

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SpawnMid_L
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if(mon_lv == 0)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_0_L,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(-42.464,8.574826,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 elseif(mon_lv == 1)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_1_L,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(-42.464,8.574826,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 elseif(mon_lv == 2)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_2_L,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(-42.464,8.574826,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 elseif(mon_lv == 3)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_3_L,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(-42.464,8.574826,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 end
self:chat_change(self.zig,"중앙으로 돌격!","돌격 앞으로!!!")

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SpawnBot_L
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if(mon_lv == 0)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_0_L,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(-42.464,7.2,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 elseif(mon_lv == 1)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_1_L,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(-42.464,7.2,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 elseif(mon_lv == 2)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_2_L,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(-42.464,7.2,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 elseif(mon_lv == 3)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_3_L,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(-42.464,7.2,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 end
self:chat_change(self.zig,"하단으로 공격!","돌격 앞으로!!!")

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SpawnTop_R
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if(mon_lv == 0)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_0_R,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(16.324,12.2,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 elseif(mon_lv == 1)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_1_R,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(16.324,12.2,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 elseif(mon_lv == 2)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_2_R,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(16.324,12.2,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 elseif(mon_lv == 3)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_3_R,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(16.324,12.2,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 end
self:chat_change(self.gal,"상단에 기계를 보내라!","이~히히히히!!")

CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if(mon_lv == 0)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_0_R,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(16.324,8.574826,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 elseif(mon_lv == 1)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_1_R,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(16.324,8.574826,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 elseif(mon_lv == 2)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_2_R,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(16.324,8.574826,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 elseif(mon_lv == 3)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_3_R,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(16.324,8.574826,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 end
self:chat_change(self.gal,"중앙으로 기계병사 돌진!","이~히히히히!!")

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SpawnBot_R
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if(mon_lv == 0)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_0_R,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(16.324,7.2,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 elseif(mon_lv == 1)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_1_R,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(16.324,7.2,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 elseif(mon_lv == 2)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_2_R,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(16.324,7.2,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 elseif(mon_lv == 3)then local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(self.mon_3_R,"dog_L"..self.num,Vector3(16.324,7.2,0),parent) self.num = self.num+1 end
self:chat_change(self.gal,"하단에 기계 출진!","이~히히히히!!")

CodeBlockMethod.Name: chat_change
CodeBlockMethod.Code: E.ChatBalloonComponent.Message = str E.ChatBalloonComponent.HideDuration = 0 local a = function() E.ChatBalloonComponent.Message = default_message E.ChatBalloonComponent.HideDuration = 5 end _TimerService:SetTimerOnce(a,5)

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity ------------------------------------------------------- if(TriggerBodyEntity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end --if(TriggerBodyEntity.Common == nil) then return end --if(TriggerBodyEntity.Common.is_player == false) then return end if TriggerBodyEntity.Common.is_left == self.is_left then self.is_Near = true TriggerBodyEntity.MonsterSummonComponent.summonUI.Enable = true TriggerBodyEntity.MonsterSummonComponent.E = self.Entity end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerLeaveEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity -------------------------------------------------------- if(TriggerBodyEntity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end if (TriggerBodyEntity.Common.is_left == self.is_left)then self.is_Near = false TriggerBodyEntity.MonsterSummonComponent.summonUI.Enable = false end
